summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment roll of L.I.D. No. 6679 for the improvement of the alley in Block 3, Ashford Addition, being the alley between 37th Avenue Southwest and 36th Avenue Southwest from Southwest Kenyon Street to Southwest Holden Street; by paving, etc., under Ordinance No. 105859, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a local improvement fund.
